text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You want me to do an interview?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Yes. According to Tazuna, the<n>reporters are practically
climbing over<n>the gates for a chance to talk to you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Yes. According to Tazuna, the<n>reporters are practically
climbing over<n>the gates for a chance to talk to you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
They must be extra interested now<n>that you're the favorite
to win the<n>autumn Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: So it would seem...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: What's wrong? Don't wanna do it?<n>Then send me instead!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
A simple "I'm currently abstaining<n>from my beloved cakes
for my diet."<n>will convince them.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Wait, did you see me pacing in front<n>of that cake shop
earlier?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I don't remember mandating a diet... It<n>must be
self-imposed.
choice_data_list: A slice or two couldn't hurt, you know?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
No, it's quite all right. If I give in to<n>temptation once, who
knows what<n>other excuses I'll make?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Anyway, I will go and speak to the<n>reporters.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
You're currently the favorite for the<n>autumn Tenno Sho.
How confident are<n>you in your ability to take home the<n>
win?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Very much so. However, one never<n>knows what may
happen during a<n>race. I wish to approach the contest<n>free
from arrogance.

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
There are some very notable<n>competitors slated to run that
day.<n>What kind of strategy are you<n>thinking of employing?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Well, ah...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro McQueen glances my way,<n>her expression
seemingly asking if<n>that is a topic she should broach.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: I'm afraid that we can't share those<n>details.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Let's just say that it would be great<n>if we could get a
starting position on<n>the inside.

text_block_list.name: Reporter C
text_block_list.text:
I've heard that at one point, your<n>team consisted only of
yourself.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That's right, though we have<n>managed to turn things around
as of<n>late.

text_block_list.name: Reporter C
text_block_list.text:
Would it be accurate to chalk that up<n>to your performance at
the spring<n>Tenno Sho?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
McQueen looks my way again. I<n>sense that she's
struggling to come<n>up with a good answer to that<n>question.
choice_data_list: Yes, that is why we're here today.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Even when the team was on the<n>verge of disbandment, she
pulled<n>through and attracted new talent with<n>her
achievement.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
McQueen's efforts have been a big<n>inspiration for the
others.

text_block_list.name: Reporter C
text_block_list.text: I see. We're expecting big things<n>from you here on out!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh! Yes! Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
Lastly, do you have anything you'd<n>like to say to your
fans?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'm honored that you would support<n>me to the point where I
am the favorite<n>to win.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'll be devoting my all to my training in<n>preparation for the
race. I do not plan<n>on letting you down.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Sheesh, so serious! Couldn't shake<n>up the typical interview
a bit?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Again, that's because I amserious.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Yeah, but all of your answers were<n>sooo cool!

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: I really can't wait for the race!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's not just the fans who are<n>expecting great things of
Mejiro<n>McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't think of anyone more<n>deserving to stand at the
center of a<n>team.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
All right, why don't we go get<n>something tasty to charge us
back<n>up?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Wooo, hella! I'm about to go to town<n>on some
all-you-can-eat lobster!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I've been wanting to try that place<n>with the famous carrot
sweets lately!

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Geez, this is a celebration for<n>McQueen, so let's let her pick,
all<n>right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Um... I'm afraid I will have to refrain.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I should really move on to my training<n>for today. That
interview took up a lot<n>of precious time.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Seriously, you're gonna go out for<n>training now? You really
good on<n>keeping up this pace?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, I won't push myself too<n>hard. The last thing I
need is a repeat<n>of the time I fell ill.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
But I'm finally hitting my stride with<n>my routine. I can't let
this chance go<n>to waste.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Is it fine with you, Trainer?
choice_data_list: I'll leave it up to you.
I'll leave it up to you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you. Well then, I shall be off.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Super serious, that one.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: At last, the day of the autumn Tenno<n>Sho arrives.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Wow, those stands are absolutely<n>packed.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Wow, those stands are absolutely<n>packed.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Meaning that Golshi Yakisoba's on<n>track for some record
profits! I've got<n>noods to fry!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
What, and miss cheering for<n>McQueen? Speaking of, where
is she?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
What, and miss cheering for<n>McQueen? Speaking of, where
is she?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: She's already on her way out there,<n>yo.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Really? But there's still so much time<n>left before the race
starts...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Really? But there's still so much time<n>left before the race
starts...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Phew...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I have the dignity of the Mejiro name<n>to bear... the hopes of
countless fans<n>on my shoulders...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
My dear team members'<n>expectations, and those of my<n>
trainer...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: For all of their sakes, I will achieve<n>victory today.
